00019 #include "../boost/xint/xint.hpp"
00020 
00021 #ifdef XINT_THREADSAFE
00022     #include <boost/thread.hpp>
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 namespace boost {
00026 namespace xint {
00027 namespace {
00028 
00029 #ifdef XINT_THREADSAFE
00030     boost::thread_specific_ptr<bool> allowed;
00031 #else
00032     bool allowed=true;
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 struct EBlockerToken: public detail::token {
00036     #ifdef XINT_THREADSAFE
00037         EBlockerToken(bool newAllowState) {
00038             if (allowed.get()==0) allowed.reset(new bool(true));
00039             mOldState=*allowed;
00040             *allowed=newAllowState;
00041         }
00042         ~EBlockerToken() { *allowed=mOldState; }
00043     #else
00044         EBlockerToken(bool newAllowState): mOldState(allowed) {
00045             allowed=newAllowState; }
00046         ~EBlockerToken() { allowed=mOldState; }
00047     #endif
00048 
00049     bool mOldState;
00050 };
00051 
00052 } // namespace
00053 
00064 bool exceptions_allowed() {
00065     #ifdef XINT_THREADSAFE
00066         // Defaults to true
00067         return (allowed.get()==0 || *allowed==true);
00068     #else
00069         return allowed;
00070     #endif
00071 }
00072 
00085 token block_exceptions() {
00086     return token(new EBlockerToken(false));
00087 }
00088 
00105 token allow_exceptions() {
00106     return token(new EBlockerToken(true));
00107 }
00108 
00109 } // namespace xint
00110 } // namespace boost
